thread.section_title: Artmill Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Artmill | artmill.com
thread.title: John C

author: John C
title: John C
text: Quality is superb and very consistent from beginning to end. Website was easy to use with online tech support immediately available while I was looking around and placing the order. It was an actual person answering my every question. The packaging was very good and my product arrived in perfect state. My order actually arrived earlier than expected and that's on top of severe weather everywhere. The product itself was flawless. I was dealing with pros and it was evident in every aspect. Definitely not looking anywhere else. I'll be a return customer for sure.
